mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) values ((select nextval('seq_reply') from dual), #{bno},#{reply},#{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = current_timestamp where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate from ( select /*index(tbl_reply idx_reply)*/ (SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RN), bno, rno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate from tbl_reply, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) AS ROWCOLUMN where bno = #{bno} and rno > 0) as t limit #{cri.amount} offset #{cri.skip};
